publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4375 Bristow Muldoon: Fairtrade Town Status for Livingston—That the Parliament congratulates Livingston on obtaining Fairtrade Town status and becoming the second town in West Lothian to achieve this status; recognises the hard work of Livingston Fairtrade Committee, West Lothian Council, civic organisations and churches in achieving this status; notes the growing support for fair trade products in Scotland and the benefits that this will bring to farmers and communities in developing countries; encourages other towns across the country to consider becoming Fairtrade towns, and also encourages everyone to buy fair trade products.

S2M-4375 Bristow Muldoon: Fairtrade Town Status for Livingston—That the Parliament congratulates Livingston on obtaining Fairtrade Town status and becoming the second town in West Lothian to achieve this status; recognises the hard work of Livingston Fairtrade Committee, West Lothian Council, civic organisations and churches in achieving this status; notes the growing support for fair trade products in Scotland and the benefits that this will bring to farmers and communities in developing countries; encourages other towns across the country to consider becoming Fairtrade towns, and also encourages everyone to buy fair trade products. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Jackie Baillie*, Mark Ballard*, Scott Barrie*, Sarah Boyack*, Bill Butler*, Linda Fabiani*, Murdo Fraser*, Marlyn Glen*, Trish Godman*, Robin Harper*, Patrick Harvie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Maureen Macmillan*, Christine May*, Pauline McNeill*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Janis Hughes*, Karen Gillon*, Karen Whitefield*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-4375 Fairtrade Town Status for Livingston (lodged on 10 May 2006) Eleanor Scott*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-4375 Fairtrade Town Status for Livingston (lodged on 10 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S2M-4375 Fairtrade Town Status for Livingston (lodged on 10 May 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, John Swinburne*
S2M-4375 Fairtrade Town Status for Livingston (lodged on 10 May 2006) Rosie Kane*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4375 Fairtrade Town Status for Livingston (lodged on 10 May 2006) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-4375 Fairtrade Town Status for Livingston (lodged on 10 May 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
